video.title: Hell on Wheels
video.synopsis: Former Confederate soldier Cullen Bohannon sets out on a quest to find his wife's killer as post-Civil War America struggles to rebuild its identity.

episodes.synopsis: A former Confederate soldier journeys to the Transcontinental Railroad to seek vengeance.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Cullen fights for his life as he answers for his deadly actions. Lily struggles to survive in the wild, as Durant spins tragedy for political gain.
episodes.title: Immoral Mathematics

episodes.synopsis: Cullen's search for the sergeant is diverted by an unexpected obstacle. Durant organizes a search party to retrieve the missing Lily Bell.
episodes.title: A New Birth of Freedom

episodes.synopsis: Cullen gets closer than ever to the sergeant. Durant pursues a hidden agenda while helping Lily recuperate.
episodes.title: Jamais je ne T'oublierai

episodes.synopsis: Durant's answer to the railroad's latest financial problems spurs a bareknuckle brawl between Cullen and Elam.
episodes.title: Bread and Circuses

episodes.synopsis: Durant attempts to end ongoing negotiations with the Cheyenne by challenging them to a competition. Cullen scrambles to prevent bloodshed in town.
episodes.title: Pride, Pomp and Circumstance

episodes.synopsis: With Elam's life in jeopardy, Cullen must decide what he's willing to risk. Durant faces financial ruin as Lily confronts her late husband's family.
episodes.title: Revelations

episodes.synopsis: Cullen's new life on the railroad is put in jeopardy when he is forced to choose between his past and his future.
episodes.title: Derailed

episodes.synopsis: It's all hands on deck as Cullen and Lily work to meet the railroad's looming deadline. Elam and Joseph deal with consequences of a violent mission.
episodes.title: Timshel

episodes.synopsis: Durant and Lily try to recruit investors. Cullen attempts to track down Sgt. Harper. Sean and Mickey go after the Swede.
episodes.title: God of Chaos

episodes.synopsis: Cullen adjusts to life after Hell On Wheels. Meanwhile, Durant dispatches Elam to deal with a posse robbing his payroll.
episodes.title: Viva La Mexico

episodes.synopsis: Durant must confront a dangerous threat to Hell on Wheels. Meanwhile, a horrible crime forces Lily and Elam to strike a deal to bring justice.
episodes.title: Durant, Nebraska

episodes.synopsis: Mickey's and Sean's lives hang in the balance as Cullen tries to keep order. Lily and Elam must work together to race to clean up a mess of their own.
episodes.title: Slaughterhouse

episodes.synopsis: After tragedy strikes one of their own, Cullen must diffuse an internal threat to the railroad.
episodes.title: Scabs

episodes.synopsis: Cullen's past haunts Hell on Wheels, leaving the fate of the railroad hanging in the balance.
episodes.title: The Railroad Job

episodes.synopsis: Durant must save the railroad while fighting for his own life. Meanwhile, Cullen fights to save an old friend.
episodes.title: Purged Away with Blood

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of tragedy, Lily and Cullen struggle to maintain order in Hell on Wheels. Meanwhile, Elam makes plans for the future.
episodes.title: The White Spirit

episodes.synopsis: A new arrival in Hell on Wheels throws everything into turmoil. Eva finds herself caught between Elam and Mr. Toole.
episodes.title: The Lord's Day

episodes.synopsis: As the railroad celebrates a victory, Cullen prepares for battle.
episodes.title: Blood Moon

episodes.synopsis: Cullen bands together with the railroad workers to save Hell on Wheels from an invading force.
episodes.title: Blood Moon Rising

episodes.synopsis: After a hard winter, Cullen and Elam travel to New York to secure their positions on the railroad, while Durant fights for his legacy from prison.
episodes.title: Big Bad Wolf

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected roadblock forces Cullen to make a difficult choice as a reporter arrives in Hell on Wheels. Elam struggles with his new boss.
episodes.title: Eminent Domain

episodes.synopsis: An attack on the cattle pens forces Cullen and Elam into the prairie in search of their stolen food. A stranger's arrival threatens Elam's family.
episodes.title: Range War

episodes.synopsis: After a railroad accident, Cullen and Elam forge deep into Indian territory to secure a new lumber source. Durant tells Louise a secret about Cullen.
episodes.title: The Game

episodes.synopsis: Cullen helps Elam track down a dangerous criminal. Chaos erupts in Hell on Wheels as the town prepares to move down the tracks.
episodes.title: Searchers

episodes.synopsis: Cullen's position is threatened after Durant files an injunction against the Union Pacific. Elam deals with a dangerous newcomer.
episodes.title: One Less Mule

episodes.synopsis: When a cholera epidemic hits Hell on Wheels, Cullen must find fresh water before his workers die. Durant faces political fallout.
episodes.title: Cholera

episodes.synopsis: After his workers defect to the Mormons, Cullen recruits Durant to help get them back. Sean and Mickey's past comes back to haunt them.
episodes.title: It Happened in Boston

episodes.synopsis: With General Grant's deadline only two days away, a gang of riders attacks Cheyenne while Cullen and Elam pay Durant a visit.
episodes.title: Fathers and Sins

episodes.synopsis: Cullen grapples with consequences while Elam mounts a rescue attempt. Durant receives Gen. Grant and the U.P. board in Cheyenne ahead of the deadline.
episodes.title: Get Behind The Mule

episodes.synopsis: Cullen waits in Fort Smith until Naomi gives birth to their baby. After the baby is born, the Swede refuses to let Cullen take his family with him.
episodes.title: The Elusive Eden

episodes.synopsis: To undermine the Swede's guise as Bishop Dutson, Cullen confesses to past crimes. As Cullen leaves Fort Smith, a new adversary arrives in Cheyenne.
episodes.title: Escape from the Garden

episodes.synopsis: Durant refuses to reinstate Cullen as chief railroad engineer. Durant and Campbell are at odds over a hill, and Cullen refuses Campbell's job offer.
episodes.title: Chicken Hill

episodes.synopsis: After a disastrous attempt to tunnel through the hill, Cullen plans a new line of track. Naomi wants more from Cullen, and a broke Eva goes to Durant.
episodes.title: Reckoning

episodes.synopsis: A dangerous stranger arrives in Cheyenne claiming to know Cullen. In Fort Smith, Brigham Young comes to question the Swede, but has his own agenda.
episodes.title: Life's a Mystery

episodes.synopsis: Elam struggles to survive after a vicious bear attack. He's nursed back to health at a Comanche village, where hallucinations start to control him.
episodes.title: Bear Man

episodes.synopsis: When a changed Elam returns to Cheyenne, Cullen tries to reach him. Cullen helps Durant after a beating, then uses the situation to his own advantage.
episodes.title: Elam Ferguson

episodes.synopsis: Naomi and the baby leave for Fort Smith. To clean up lawless Cheyenne, Campbell hires Sidney as the new marshal. Sidney arrests Psalms and his crew.
episodes.title: Under Color of Law

episodes.synopsis: Cullen's failure to convince Sidney to release Psalms and his railroad crew has consequences for everyone. Campbell and Louise become more involved.
episodes.title: Two Trains

episodes.synopsis: Cullen, Durant and Campbell try to take back Cheyenne's streets. Cullen demands that Sidney pay for his treachery. Sidney challenges Cullen to a duel.
episodes.title: Return to Hell

episodes.synopsis: Cullen, Durant and Eva try to save the life of a criminal. Ruth awaits her fate. A new saloon proprietor arrives in Cheyenne.
episodes.title: Bleeding Kansas

episodes.synopsis: Cullen agonizes over Ruth's decision. Louise publishes a damning article about Campbell. As the railroad nears a milestone, Cullen makes a decision.
episodes.title: Thirteen Steps

episodes.synopsis: When Cullen returns to Fort Smith for Naomi, he learns she left after a smallpox epidemic took many lives. Cullen takes on a new railroad opportunity.
episodes.title: Further West
